DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, add a card that #yChannels orbs to your hand with #yEthereal and #yExhaust. When exited, gain #b1 #yFocus.
Orb: At the start of your turn, gain #b1 Block and deal #b1 damage to a random enemy. When #yEvoked, gain #b3 Block and deal #b3 damage to a random enemy.
